price: 6. Nabii Mucammad ﷺ dirabboyse mari (koros kinnuk) anqasah kaak iyyeh : kee Qhuraan elle obsime numow diggah atu cabuli anu Nabii kinniyo itta waqdi.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuhā alladhī nuzzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru innaka lamajnūnun
